LanguageData.BuildAssaultRifle.label: 제작 : M16 소총 (돌격소총)
LanguageData.BuildAssaultRifle.description: Builds a general-purpose military assault 소총 for field or urban combat. Fires a 3-점사.\n구경 : 5.56x45mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildSG553Gun.label: 제작 : SIG SG553 (소총)
LanguageData.BuildSG553Gun.description: The SIG SG553, a slightly improved version of the SG552, is the SBR (Short Barrel 소총) version of the SIG SG550. Average damage and range, good rate of fire and accurracy.\n구경 : 5.56x45mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildAUG.label: 제작 : 슈타이어 AUG A3 (돌격소총)
LanguageData.BuildAUG.description: The 슈타이어 AUG A3 is an Austrian bullpup 5.56×45mm NATO assault 소총, designed in the 1960s by Steyr Mannlicher GmbH. Average damage, good range, good accuracy and low rate of fire.\n구경 : 5.56x45mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildSCAR_H.label: 제작 : FN SCAR-H (돌격소총)
LanguageData.BuildSCAR_H.description: The Special Operations Forces Combat Assault 소총 (SCAR) is a gas-operated self-loading 소총 with a rotating bolt. Good damage, good range, good accuracy and low rate of fire.\n구경 : 7.62x51mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildFAMAS.label: 제작 : 파마스 G2 (돌격소총)
LanguageData.BuildFAMAS.description: The 파마스 is a bullpup-styled assault 소총. Average damage and range, good rate of fire and accurracy.\n구경 : 5.56x45mm NATO
LanguageData.DeconstructPersonalShield.label: 해체: 개인 보호막
LanguageData.DeconstructPersonalShield.description: 해체: 개인 보호막 to retrieve some of the materials used to craft it. Produces 30 steel bars and 2 집적 회로.
LanguageData.BuildXM8MilitaryRifle.label: 제작 : HK XM8 군용 소총 (소총)
LanguageData.BuildXM8MilitaryRifle.description: Builds the HK XM8 군용 소총, an ancient pattern military weapon. Three-점사. Good range, low power an high rate of fire.\n구경 : 5.56x45mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildXM8MilitaryRifle.jobString: 제작 중 : HK XM8 군용 소총.
LanguageData.BuildAK47Gun.label: 제작 : AK-47 (돌격소총)
LanguageData.BuildAK47Gun.description: Builds the AK-47, a selective-fire, gas-operated assault 소총. Good damage, average range and rate of fire but poor accuracy.\n구경 : 7.62x39mm Soviet
LanguageData.BuildTacticalCombatrifle.label: 제작 : MA5 ICWS (돌격소총)
LanguageData.BuildTacticalCombatrifle.description: Builds the MA5 Individual Combat Weapon 시스템 (MA5 ICWS or MA5 Assault 소총). It is a standard-issue service 소총 of the UNSC Marines.\n구경 : 5.56x45mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildMarineSturmRifle.label: 제작 : 타볼 TAR-21(소총)
LanguageData.BuildMarineSturmRifle.description: Builds the 타볼 TAR-21. Fires a 5 점사.\n구경 : 5.56x45mm NATO
